name: JIRA Dark 2 (NightShift based)
description: Fork of style 116696 with additional modifications to the original "JIRA Dark (NightShift - eye care)," focused on the Agile backlog and board views. Background color is slightly darker for enhanced contrast, and icons, badges, points, etc. are more visible.
additional_info: GitHub Change Log 2018-07-12: Fix highlight for selected point value in Agile Poker Enterprise (add-on). 2018-04-17: Clean up formatting, a few more highlighting fixes. 2018-04-11: Fix selection highlights on the Agile board (both Active Sprints and Backlog views). Fix some left hand menu highlights. Adjust Backlog view Sprint divider borders to be less intrusive. 2018-01-16: Fix color pickers (ex. Card Color), progress bars (Version/Release progress). Fix Rich Text Editor colors. 2017-05-03: Slightly darker background colors, various tweaks for badges, headers, and icons, primarily in the Agile view(s).
